mention.text: the world as a modern power
a trove of mothballed historical artifacts
The Western perception of its culture
The new Chinese government under Xi
a step-by-step program to introduce the West to its culture , starting from the outward attributes of China

that of a primary school teacher who needs to explain to the children that the adult world of the Chinese civilization is a hundred times older and more complex than all Western civilizations combined , which is far from an easy task
huge financial and political resources that are lavished on the promotion of China
Americans and Europeans to their culture
their students ahead of the high school
the question of how it has been surviving alongside liberal economic reforms
